snippet.description:
We discuss the famed Turin Shroud in a chemistry context, including how radiocarbon dating has famously been used on the religious relic. More links in description below ↓↓↓

Correction: It's a proton and electron COMBINING to create C14... I made the poor Professor stand in the Italian sun for so long waiting for the right light conditions that I may have temporarily fried his brain. Correction is included as an annotaion.

Our trip to Turin supported by http://www.cost.esf.org/

Support Periodic Videos on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/periodicvideos

snippet.description:
